Class ItemListAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemHolder>

All Implemented Interfaces:
ListClickListener<ItemHolder>
public class ItemListAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ItemHolder> implements ListClickListener<ItemHolder>
A RecyclerView adapter linking ItemHolder's data to the ItemList
